metadata.title: CVE-2016-0767 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: PostgreSQL PL/Java before 1.5.0 allows remote authenticated users withUSAGE permission on the public schema to alter the public schema classpath.

criterions.comment: postgresql-pljava: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
